package_name: Conquer the Roof of Africa: Mount Kilimanjaro Expedition

places_to_visit.name: Mount Kilimanjaro
places_to_visit.description: Mount Kilimanjaro is the highest mountain in Africa, standing at 5,895 meters (19,341 feet) above sea level. It is a dormant volcano with three volcanic cones: Kibo, Mawenzi, and Shira. Kilimanjaro is known for its snow-capped peak, diverse ecosystems, and as one of the Seven Summits. Climbers experience varying landscapes, from tropical rainforests to alpine deserts, culminating in the ice fields at the summit.

activities: Climbing to the summit of Mount Kilimanjaro
Exploring diverse ecosystems along the mountain’s slopes
Camping under the stars on the mountain
tips_and_tricks: Acclimatize properly to avoid altitude sickness.
Pack warm clothing, as temperatures can drop significantly at higher altitudes.
Stay hydrated and maintain a steady pace during the climb.

activities: Arrival at Kilimanjaro International Airport and transfer to Arusha
Briefing on the Kilimanjaro climb and equipment check
Dinner at the hotel and overnight stay
Transfer to Moshi, the base town for Kilimanjaro climbs
Final preparations and acclimatization activities
Dinner and overnight stay in Moshi

timeline.location: Kilimanjaro - Marangu Gate to Mandara Hut
activities: Start the climb from Marangu Gate
Trek through rainforest to Mandara Hut (2,700 meters)
Dinner and overnight at Mandara Hut

timeline.location: Kilimanjaro - Mandara Hut to Horombo Hut
activities: Trek through heathland to Horombo Hut (3,720 meters)
Scenic views of Mawenzi and Kibo peaks
Dinner and overnight at Horombo Hut

timeline.location: Kilimanjaro - Horombo Hut to Kibo Hut
activities: Trek through the alpine desert to Kibo Hut (4,700 meters)
Rest and prepare for the summit attempt
Dinner and overnight at Kibo Hut
Early morning start to reach the summit, Uhuru Peak (5,895 meters)
Celebrate the achievement at the Roof of Africa
Descend to Horombo Hut for overnight stay
Continue the descent to Marangu Gate
Receive a certificate of accomplishment
Transfer to Moshi for celebration dinner and overnight stay
Transfer to Kilimanjaro International Airport for departure
